Complex_Rules: Combination of Entity_ID and Period_End must be unique
Period_End must be a month-end date equal to (Period_Start + 1 year - 1 day)
Primary_Farm_Class must exist in the Production_Region which maps to the given Territory
Solid_Separator_Use must be FALSE if no StockClass of Milking Cows Mature is present for the Entity_ID and Period_End
Solid_Separator_Use must be FALSE if the aggregate sum of Dairy_Shed_hr and Other_Structures_hr in Effluent_Structure_Use is 0 for the Entity_ID and Period_End
Solid_Separator_Use must be FALSE if Effluent_EcoPond_Treatments contains records for the Entity_ID and Period_End
Combination of Entity_ID and Period_End must be unique and exist in FarmYear
Combination of Entity_ID and Period_End must exist in FarmYear
StockClass must be unique within Entity_ID and Period_End
StockClass cannot be newborn (StockClass values containing R1 or Lambs)
Combination of Entity_ID and Period_End must exist in FarmYear
StockClass must be unique within Month, Entity_ID and Period_End
Births can only be >= 1 for newborn StockClass (StockClass values containing R1 or Lambs)
Deaths cannot exceed the current StockClass balance for the Month, Entity_ID and Period_End
Combination of Entity_ID and Period_End must exist in FarmYear
Transaction_Date must be between (Period_End - 1 Year + 1 Day) and Period_End, inclusive
Stock_Count cannot exceed the current StockClass balance when Transaction_Type values are Sale or Transfer Out for the Entity_ID and Period_End
Combination of Entity_ID and Period_End must exist in FarmYear
Month must be unique within Entity_ID and Period_End
Milk_L_herd must be 0 if no Milking Cows Mature are present for the Month, Entity_ID and Period_End
Milk_Fat_kg_herd and Milk_Protein_kg_herd must be 0 if Milk_L_herd is 0
Milk_Fat_kg_herd must be <= 15% of Milk_L_herd
Milk_Protein_kg_herd must be <= 15% of Milk_L_herd
Milk_L_Herd must be > 0 if Effluent_Structure_Use.Dairy_Shed_hrs_day > 0 for the Month, Entity_ID, and Period_End
Milk_L_Herd must be 0 if Effluent_Structure_Use.Dairy_Shed_hrs_day is 0 for the Month, Entity_ID, and Period_End
Combination of Entity_ID and Period_End must exist in FarmYear
Supplement must be unique within Entity_ID and Period_End
Sum of Beef, Dairy, Deer, and Sheep Allocations must be 1 if Dry_Matter_t > 0
Sum of Beef, Dairy, Deer, and Sheep Allocations must be 0 if Dry_Matter_t is 0
Allocation for a Sector must be 0 if no StockClass from that Sector is present
Combination of Entity_ID and Period_End must exist in FarmYear
StockClass must be unique within Entity_ID and Period_End
StockClass balance must be >=1 for at least 1 day for the Entity_ID and Period_End
Combination of Entity_ID and Period_End must exist in FarmYear
Breed_Allocation records are only allowed and required for Entity_ID and Period_End with female Dairy StockClass present (Dairy Heifers R1, Dairy Heifers R2, Milking Cows Mature)
Breed must be unique within Entity_ID and Period_End
Breed_Allocation must aggregate sum to 1 per Entity_ID and Period_End
Combination of Entity_ID and Period_End must exist in FarmYear and their Solid_Separator_Use must be FALSE
Treatment_Date must be unique within Entity_ID and Period_End
Treatment_Date must be within the 2 years prior to Period_End
Guidance: If treatment was performed in the previous period, include the last Treatment_Date from that period
Combination of Entity_ID and Period_End must exist in FarmYear
Month must be unique within Entity_ID and Period_End
12 rows should exist, one for every unique Month, if Milking Cows Mature are present for an Entity_ID and Period_End
Sum of Dairy_Shed_hrs_day and Other_Structures_hrs_day must be <= 24
Sum of Dairy_Shed_hrs_day and Other_Structures_hrs_day must be 0 if no Milking Cows Mature are present for Month, Entity_ID and Period_End
Dairy_Shed_hrs_day must be > 0 if Dairy_Production.Milk_L_Herd is > 0 for the Month, Entity_ID and Period_End
Dairy_Shed_hrs_day must be 0 if Dairy_Production.Milk_L_Herd is 0 for the Month, Entity_ID and Period_End
